PROJECT_NEW_FOLDER.description: Create a folder within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FILE.description: Create a file within a project

PROJECT_HIDE_CONSOLE.description: Button designed to hide the console

PROJECT_WELCOME_CREATE_NEW_APP.description: Button to create a new project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_IMPORT.description: Import a project from an archive

PROJECT_LIBRARY_EXPORT.description: Export a project from the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_RENAME.description: Rename a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_DELETE.description: Delete a project within the workspace

PROJECTS_NO_PROJECT.message: Vous n'avez pas encore de projets.
PROJECTS_NO_PROJECT.description: Message displayed in the Projects Library when the list of projects is empty.

PROJECTS_CREATE_APPLICATION.message: Cliquez sur le bouton "Créer une nouvelle application" ci-dessous
PROJECTS_CREATE_APPLICATION.description: Message displayed in the Projects Library when the list of projects is empty.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_NOT_PERSISTENT.message: Le système de stockage n'est pas persistant. Cela signifie que vos projets peuvent être supprimés à tout moment sans préavis. Pour éviter cela, exportez fréquemment vos projets.
PROJECTS_STORAGE_NOT_PERSISTENT.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when persistent storage is not available. We recommend you to use Firefox.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_ASK_PERSISTENT.message: Le système de stockage n'est pas persistant. Veuillez autoriser rendre le stockage persistant.
PROJECTS_STORAGE_ASK_PERSISTENT.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when persistent storage is available but not permitted.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_BUTTON_ASK_PERSISTENT.description: The button the user clicks to ask persistance.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_BROWSER_ERROR.message: Si votre navigateur ne vous demande pas d'autoriser la persistance, il s'agit d'un problème avec votre navigateur. Pour éviter de perdre vos projets, vous devez ajouter ce site Web aux bookmarks, l’utiliser souvent et exporter fréquemment vos projets. Nous vous recommandons également d'utiliser Firefox.
PROJECTS_STORAGE_BROWSER_ERROR.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when persistent storage is not available.

PROJECT_DELETE_FOLDER.description: Delete a folder within a project

PROJECT_RENAME_FOLDER.description: Rename a folder within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FOLDER_NAME.description: Label for the new name of the folder

PROJECT_FOLDER_SURE.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce dossier?
PROJECT_FOLDER_SURE.description: Prompt asking for assurance on deleting a folder

PROJECT_DELETE_FILE.description: Delete a file within a project

PROJECT_RENAME_FILE.description: Rename a file within a project

PROJECT_IMPORT_FILE.description: Import a file within a project

PROJECT_EXPORT_FILE.description: Export a file from the project

PROJECT_NEW_FILE_NAME.description: Label for the new name of the file

PROJECT_FILE_SURE.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce fichier?
PROJECT_FILE_SURE.description: Prompt asking for assurance on deleting a file

PROJECT_NEW_NAME.description: Label for the new name of the object

PROJECT_DELETE_PROJECT.description: Label for the dialog to delete a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LOAD_PROJECT.description: Text meaning that there is no project loaded

PROJECT_PROJECT_SURE.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce projet?
PROJECT_PROJECT_SURE.description: Prompt asking for assuruance on deleting a project

PROJECT_LIBRARY_NAME.description: Label for the name of the project

PROJECT_LIBRARY_CLONE.description: Clone a project within the workspace

PROJECT_ERROR_LANGUAGE_ADDON.description: The error message shown when a language addon fails to register

PROJECT_ERROR_REGISTER_EDITOR.description: The error message shown when an edtitor fails to register

PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_PROJECTS.message: Erreur lors du chargement des projets ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_PROJECTS.description: The error message shown when the projects fail to load

PROJECT_ERROR_SELECT_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors de la sélection du projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_SELECT_PROJECT.description: The error message shown when a project fails to be selected

PROJECT_ERROR_CREATE_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors de la création du projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_CREATE_PROJECT.description: The error message shown when a project fails to be created

PROJECT_ERROR_RENAME_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors du changement de nom du projet {project} en {name} ({error})

PROJECT_ERROR_CLONE_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors du clonage du projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_CLONE_PROJECT.description: The error message shown when a project fails to be cloned

PROJECT_ERROR_DELETE_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors de la supression du projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_DELETE_PROJECT.description: The error message shown when a project fails to be deleted

PROJECT_ERROR_IMPORT_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors de l'importation du projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_IMPORT_PROJECT.description: The error message shown when a project fails to be imported

PROJECT_ERROR_EXPORT_PROJECT.message: Erreur lors de l'exportation du projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_EXPORT_PROJECT.description: The error message shown when a project fails to be exported

PROJECT_ERROR_NEW_FOLDER.message: Erreur lors de la création d'un nouveau dossier {folder} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_NEW_FOLDER.description: The error message shown when a folder fails to be created

PROJECT_ERROR_NEW_FILE.message: Erreur lors de la création d'un nouveau fichier {file} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_NEW_FILE.description: The error message shown when a file fails to be created

PROJECT_ERROR_RENAME_OBJECT.message: Erreur lors du changement de nom de l'objet {object} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_RENAME_OBJECT.description: The error message shown when an object fails to be renamed

PROJECT_ERROR_DELETE_FOLDER.message: Erreur lors de la supression du dossier {folder} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_DELETE_FOLDER.description: The error message shown when a folder fails to be deleted

PROJECT_ERROR_DELETE_FILE.message: Erreur lors de la supression du fichier {file} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_DELETE_FILE.description: The error message shown when a file fails to be deleted

PROJECTS_JSON_DO_NOT.message: Vous avez essayé de modifier le fichier project.json, NE FAITES PAS CELA
PROJECTS_JSON_DO_NOT.description: The error message when the user is trying to edit the project.json file of a project.

PROJECT_ERROR_SAVE_FILE.message: Erreur lors de l'enregistrement du fichier {file} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_SAVE_FILE.description: The error message shown when a file fails to be saved

PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_FILE.message: Erreur lors du chargement du fichier {file} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_FILE.description: The error message shown when file fails to be loaded

PROJECT_ERROR_READ_DATA.message: Erreur lors de la lecture des données pour le projet {project} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_READ_DATA.description: The error message shown when there is an error reading the data for the project

PROJECT_ERROR_NOT_FOLDER.message: Le dossier du projet {project} n'est pas un dossier valide.
PROJECT_ERROR_NOT_FOLDER.description: The error message shown when there is no folder

PROJECT_ERROR_SAVE_SPECIAL_FILE.message: Erreur lors de l'enregistrement du fichier spécial {file} avec des données ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_SAVE_SPECIAL_FILE.description: The error message shown when a special settings file fails to be saved

PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_SPECIAL_FILE.message: Erreur lors du chargement du fichier spécial {file} avec des données ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_SPECIAL_FILE.description: The error message shown when a special settings file fails to be loaded

PROJECT_ERROR_SEND_CODE.message: Erreur lors de l'envoi du code de fichier {file} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_SEND_CODE.description: The error message shown when there is an error while sending the file code to the device

PROJECT_ERROR_PATH_INVALID.message: Erreur, le chemin n'est pas dans le dossier workspace
PROJECT_ERROR_PATH_INVALID.description: The error message shown when the specified path is not in the workspace folder

PROJECT_ERROR_CHANGE_DATE.description: The error message shown when a date for a file fails to be written

PROJECT_JSON_DO_NOT.message: Vous avez essayé de modifier le fichier project.json, NE FAITES PAS CELA
PROJECT_JSON_DO_NOT.description: The error message shown when there is an attempt at editing the project settings file

PROJECT_CLONE_PROJECT.description: Label for the clone project dialog

PROJECT_RENAME_PROJECT.description: Label for the rename project dialog

PROJECT_NAME_PROMPT.message: Veuillez saisir le nom du projet.
PROJECT_NAME_PROMPT.description: Label for the new name to be given to the project

PROJECT_NULL.message: Un ou plusieurs paramètres sont nuls
PROJECT_NULL.description: One or more of the funciton's parameters are null

PATH_NULL.description: The given path turned out null

PROJECTS_NO_FILE.message: Aucun fichier n'est sélectionné, veuillez importer, créer ou sélectionner un fichier.
PROJECTS_NO_FILE.description: The message the user sees in the Application Tab when there is no file for the editor

PROJECTS_EXTENSION_URECOGNIZED.message: L'extension de fichier n'est pas reconnue
PROJECTS_EXTENSION_URECOGNIZED.description: The message the user sees in the Application Tab when the file extension is not valid

PROJECTS_INVALID_PROJECT.message: Vous avez ouvert un projet invalide, veuillez en sélectionner un autre.
PROJECTS_INVALID_PROJECT.description: The message the user sees in the Application Tab when the selected project is an invalid one

PROJECTS_READ_ONLY_FILE_SYSTEM.message: L'espace de stockage est en lecture seule, les projets ne peuvent être ouverts.
PROJECTS_READ_ONLY_FILE_SYSTEM.description: The message the user sees when the storage space is read only and no projects can be created

PROJECT_ERROR_SAVE_SCHEMATIC.message: Erreur lors de la sauvegarde du schéma {file} avec des données ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_SAVE_SCHEMATIC.description: The error message shown when a special settings file fails to be saved

PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_SCHEMATIC.message: Erreur lors du chargement du schéma {file} ({error})
PROJECT_ERROR_LOAD_SCHEMATIC.description: The error message shown when a special settings file fails to be loaded

PROJECT_EXISTS_PROMPT.message: Un projet portant ce nom existe déjà.
PROJECT_EXISTS_PROMPT.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when a project with an already existing name is created or imported
